name: Papipelle
description:
Just a jam game with spaghetti code, finger licking good art and annoying music (yet sometimes relaxing)

It's recommended playing with 2 USB Controllers, keyboard split available but laggy as hell for aiming (WASD+IJKL)

Each player controls 1 of the characters (chosen randomly)

The goal is either for the Little Brat to fill more than 50% of the map with snow, or either for the Old Man to remove more than 50% of the snow on the map.

All of that at a frantic pace.

Little Brat:

- Left stick: Movement

- Right stick: Aiming

- Right Trigger: Pick up snow beneath the player and switch to aiming (Hold)

Old Man:

- Left stick: Movement

- Right Trigger: Remove snow beneath the player
